info.name: Gemini TTS API v2.0
info.description: Text-to-Speech API using Google Gemini with Background Job Processing. Supports 30 voices and 24 languages including Sinhala. Features real-time job tracking and progress monitoring.

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy. Now includes job queue status.

Get list of all 30 available voices for TTS
Queue a TTS job for background processing. Returns immediately with job ID and estimated processing time.
Get the status and progress of a specific job. Use this to monitor job completion.

query.description: Filter by status (pending, processing, completed, failed)

request.description: Get list of all jobs with optional filtering by status and limit
Cancel a pending job. Cannot cancel jobs that are already processing or completed.
Convert text to speech synchronously and return base64 encoded audio data directly. Use for short texts only.
Get list of all generated audio files with metadata
Download a specific audio file by filename
Example with large text to demonstrate background processing benefits
Example demonstrating Sinhala language support with background processing
